inputSpec.name: gene_list
inputSpec.label: List of Genes to Restrict to
inputSpec.help: One Gene per line. VEP Options must be set to use

inputSpec.name: sample_list
inputSpec.label: List of Sample to Restrict result to
inputSpec.help: One Sample per line. Must be in format GHS_PT###_####.  Will run on all samples if not set

inputSpec.name: Ensembl
inputSpec.label: Use Ensembl transcritpts for VEP filtering instead of RefSeq.

inputSpec.name: VEP_Level
inputSpec.label: VEP IMPACT Level
inputSpec.help: Highest VEP Impact to filter too: 0=Everything,1=Modifier, 2=Low, 3=Moderate,4=High.

inputSpec.name: cannonical
inputSpec.label: Use cannonical transcritpts for VEP filtering
inputSpec.help: Transcript must be set to use option.

inputSpec.name: HGMD_Level
inputSpec.label: HGMD Category
inputSpec.help: HIGHEST Include variants from HGMD. 6=DM, 5=DM?, 4=DP, 3=DFP, 2=FTV, 1=FP. No filtering for HGMD on allele level in multiallelic variants

inputSpec.name: ClinVar_Star
inputSpec.label: ClinVar Star Level
inputSpec.help: ClinVar Star Level to Filter to.  Must be set to select ClinVar variants.  Set to 0 to retrive all

inputSpec.name: ClinVarSignificance_Level
inputSpec.label: ClinVar Significance Level
inputSpec.help: Highest ClinVar Significance to filter too: 8='Pathogenic', 7='Likely pathogenic', 6='Drug Response', 5='Protective',4='Risk Factor' or 'association' or 'Affects', 3='Uncertain Significance' or 'not provided' 2='Likely benign' 1='Benign'
